article.headline: Sam Houston St. 74, Nicholls 56
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas -- Lance Pevehouse scored 13 points Saturday in Sam Houston State's 74-56 victory over Nicholls State. The Bearkats (9-7, 2-1 Southland Conference) also got 12 points from Gilberto Clavell, 11 from Drae Murray and 10 from Josten Crow. Anatoly Bose scored 15 points for the Colonels (7-7, 1-2), but no one else reached double figures. The battle of the conference's two top scorers fizzled somewhat. Bose was averaging 23.5 points per game and Clavell 19.3. The Bearkats bolted to a 10-0 lead and never trailed. They led 35-25 at halftime, then scored the first 15 points after the break. Sam Houston State shot 54.0 percent (27 of 50) and 50.0 percent (7 of 14) from 3-point range. Nicholls State was limited to 29.2 percent (18 of 62) and 21.7 percent (5 of 23) on 3-pointers. The Bearkats held a 44-35 rebounding edge, led by Antuan Bootle's 12.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
